alert.note: Alert for Greene; Morgan; Newton; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 6:29PM EDT until July 21 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Morgan County in north central Georgia... South central Walton County in north central Georgia... Northern Greene County in east central Georgia... East central Newton County in north central Georgia... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 629 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Apalachee to near Brick Store, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Madison, Greensboro, Social Circle, Union Point, Rutledge, Buckhead, Carey, Swords, Hard Labor Creek State Park, Greshamville, Brick Store and Apalachee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
